Author: Lairabel09
Text: That's really encouraging!! I think it might help with all the anxiety... Thank u and happy new year <3

Author: maple-dipped
Text: Feels soooo good doing this! I tried this a few months ago by uninstalling MFP on my phone, and I also stopped weighing myself. 2 months later when I finally did weigh myself, my weight hadn't moved up or down. I was so relieved and it really solidified my confidence in not needing so much control over what I eat.  Good luck to you <3
